TopicTitle: Move a part based on where you clicked?

Articles.Content: Hey all, trying to make a spaceplane (again, sigh), anyways for this design I need to move a part in a way that the middle is not touching the hull of the ship, however whenever you click on a part you grab it from the middle, is there a way to "grab" it from the end or where you clicked?
Some parts allow what you are asking, but it just depends on the part. If you post a picture of exactly what you're trying to do, people might have techniques to overcome your problem.
Just place it down again, (not attached) and click where you want to "hold" it from. Works with most parts.
